TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PartialCachingControl extends System.Web.UI.BasePartialCachingControl

summary.span: 在以下情况时创建：使用 [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) 页指令或 属性为输出缓存指定用户控件（.ascx 文件），并且通过用 方法动态加载用户控件，将用户控件插入页的控件层次结构。

span.span: Created when a user control (.ascx file) is specified for output caching, using either the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) page directive or the attribute, and the user control is inserted into a page's control hierarchy by dynamically loading the user control with the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面和控件开发人员不能直接使用该类。Page and control developers cannot use the class directly. 如果动态加载的用户控件启用了输出缓存, ASP.NET 会创建类的实例来包装用户控件 (.ascx 文件)。ASP.NET creates an instance of the class to wrap a user control (.ascx file) when a dynamically loaded user control enables output caching. 可以使用[@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)页指令或属性为用户控件启用输出缓存。You can enable output caching for a user control using either the [@ OutputCache](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) page directive or the attribute. 可以通过调用方法, 以编程方式向页面添加用户控件。You add a user control to a page programmatically by calling the method.

related.span: 缓存 ASP.NET 页面的部分

span.span: Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CachedControl As Control
public: property System::Web::UI::Control ^ CachedControl { System::Web::UI::Control ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对已缓存的用户控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the user control that is cached.
The user control that is cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当未缓存用户控件的输出时, 此属性才返回该控件。This property returns the user control only when its output is not cached. 如果输出缓存中存在用户控件输出, 则此属性返回`null`, 因为绝不会创建该控件的实例。If the user control output exists in the output cache, this property returns `null`, because an instance of the control is never created.
